src:
View Photos of the 2020 Nissan Altima AWD and 2020 Subaru Legacy
05 Nov 2019, 18:58 by Car and Driver











Nissan has challenged Subarus all-wheel-drive dominance in the family-sedan segment, so we set out to choose a winner.

From Car and Driver
